item.title: GitLab With Docker
item.description: Install Docker Uninstall old versions sudo yum remove docker \ docker-client \ docker-client-latest \ docker-common \ docker-latest \ docker-latest-logrotate \ docker-logrotate \ docker-engine Set up the repository Install requirements sudo yum install -y yum-utils \ device-mapper-persistent-data \ lvm2 Set up stable repository sudo yum-config-manager \ --add-repo \ https://download.docker.com/linux/centos/docker-ce.repo Install docker engine sudo yum install docker-ce docker-ce-cli containerd.io Start Docker sudo systemctl start docker GitLab image Pull image sudo docker pull gitlab/gitlab-ce Run GitLab sudo docker run --detach \ --hostname gitlab.
